      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      static double bySimpsonRule(double fa, double fb, double fc)
      c-a = 1 S = ∫ ca f(x) dx = (c-a)/6 (f(a)+4*f(b)+f(c)) b = (a+c)/2
      static double bySimpsonRule(double f0, double f1, double f2, double h)
      integral of f(x) (start < x < end) start = x[0], end =x[2], x[1] = (x[2]+x[0])/2, h = x[2]-x[0] answer = h/6*(f(x[0])+4*f(x[1])+f(x[2])) http ://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B7%E3%83%B3%E3%83%97%E3%82%BD%E3%83%B3 %E3%81%AE%E5%85%AC%E5%BC%8F by the rule of Simpson integral of f(x) x[0] ≤ x ≤ x[2] is to be obtained.
      static double bySimpsonRule(double a, double c, double fa, double fb, double fc)
      integral of f(x) (a < x < c) answer = (c-a)/6 (f(a)+4*f(b)+f(c)) b = (a+c)/2
      static double jeffreysMethod1(double[] y)
      1: integral from 0 to 2h (a x**-0.5 + b x**0.5) dx
      2: integral from 0 to 3h (a x**-0.5 + b x**0.5) dx
      3: integral from 0 to 3h (a x**-0.5 + b x**0.5 + c x**1.5) dx
      4: integral from 0 to 2h (a x**0.5 + b x**1.5) dx
      5: integral from 0 to 3h (a x**0.5 + b x**1.5) dx
      6: integral from 0 to 3h (a x**0.5 + b x**1.5 + c x**2.5) dx
      page 302 Jeffereys Jeffreys
      static double jeffreysMethod2(double[] y) 
      static double jeffreysMethod3(double[] y) 
      static double jeffreysMethod4(double[] y) 
      static double jeffreysMethod5(double[] y)

    • メソッドの詳細

      • bySimpsonRule

        public static double bySimpsonRule(double f0,
                                   double f1,
                                   double f2,
                                   double h)
        integral of f(x) (start < x < end) start = x[0], end =x[2], x[1] = (x[2]+x[0])/2, h = x[2]-x[0] answer = h/6*(f(x[0])+4*f(x[1])+f(x[2])) http ://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B7%E3%83%B3%E3%83%97%E3%82%BD%E3%83%B3 %E3%81%AE%E5%85%AC%E5%BC%8F by the rule of Simpson integral of f(x) x[0] ≤ x ≤ x[2] is to be obtained.
        パラメータ:
        f0 - f(x[0])
        f1 - f(x[1])
        f2 - f(x[2])
        h - step length
        戻り値:
        integrand of the f

      • bySimpsonRule

        public static double bySimpsonRule(double a,
                                   double c,
                                   double fa,
                                   double fb,
                                   double fc)
        integral of f(x) (a < x < c) answer = (c-a)/6 (f(a)+4*f(b)+f(c)) b = (a+c)/2
        パラメータ:
        a - a
        c - c
        fa - f(a)
        fb - f(b)
        fc - f(c)
        戻り値:
        the value of integral

      • bySimpsonRule

        public static double bySimpsonRule(double fa,
                                   double fb,
                                   double fc)
        c-a = 1 S = ∫ ca f(x) dx = (c-a)/6 (f(a)+4*f(b)+f(c)) b = (a+c)/2
        パラメータ:
        fa - f(a)
        fb - f(b)
        fc - f(c)
        戻り値:
        S

      • jeffreysMethod1

        public static double jeffreysMethod1(double[] y)
        1: integral from 0 to 2h (a x**-0.5 + b x**0.5) dx
        2: integral from 0 to 3h (a x**-0.5 + b x**0.5) dx
        3: integral from 0 to 3h (a x**-0.5 + b x**0.5 + c x**1.5) dx
        4: integral from 0 to 2h (a x**0.5 + b x**1.5) dx
        5: integral from 0 to 3h (a x**0.5 + b x**1.5) dx
        6: integral from 0 to 3h (a x**0.5 + b x**1.5 + c x**2.5) dx
        page 302 Jeffereys Jeffreys
        パラメータ:
        y - for the approximation
        戻り値:
        value by 1
